content: to be are hanging from the same end weave in ends replaced the first double_crochet used will only show for 12 row but you will start to see all other colors featured for 24 row two-color bobble work each stitch with its opposite color so the bound off knit until scarf measures approximately 98″ / 249cm or desired length sts that lie across the top of each column will match the column color remember to bind off loosely for example work a dark color column stitch with the light color then work the next stitch with dark color bind off one stitch loosely work the next stitch with light color bind off one stitch loosely work the next stitch with dark color bind off one stitch etc… © 2013 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 4 photography by westknits version 2
